title: College Courses
intro: Curricula designed for emerging storytellers working across motion, code, and installation.

courses.title: Intermediate Media Production
courses.shortDescription: Hybrid studio covering documentary, editing, and critique-led workshops. A hands-on approach to learning filmmaking. Students create four short films, individually and in groups, and learn skills in camera operation, audio recording, editing, audio mixing, color correction and lighting.
departments: UNC-Chapel Hill Department of Communications, Duke University Art of the Moving Image

courses.title: Motion Graphic Production
courses.shortDescription: Students learn techniques in motion design through a series of assignments designed to both cultivate technical proficiency and to develop a personal style. Students are introduced to software tools including Adobe After Effects, Adobe Illustrator, and Adobe Audition.
departments: UNC-Chapel Hill Department of Communications, Duke University Art of the Moving Image

courses.title: Interactive Graphics
courses.shortDescription: In this beginner-friendly course, students gain an understanding of how to use  programming languages as creative modes of expression. Through the study of JavaScript in the library p5.js, students work through hands-on exercises in order to gain an understanding of object oriented programming and principles of interactive design.
departments: Duke University Department of Art, Art History & Visual Studies

courses.title: Foundations of Interactive Media
courses.shortDescription: In this class, students are introduced to front-end development languages and user interface design tools. Students examine and understand the value of interactive media in the journalism industry and begin to develop the skills to execute their own ideas.
departments: UNC-Chapel Hill Hussman School of Journalism and Media

courses.title: Intro to Digital Storytelling
courses.shortDescription: A core storytelling and production course required for all Hussman School of Journalism and Media students. I partnered with the undergraduate department chair to develop and co-author the curriculum, rubric, and project briefs, which span video production, graphic design, and web development.
departments: UNC-Chapel Hill Hussman School of Journalism and Media
